Summary: Glowing object, irregular flight path, circled around before shooting off past the clouds.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside sitting on the stairs observing the sky. It was a cloudy evening. I looked off to the south and up in the sky a white light shot into my view from the east. It made a strange movement, circled back around, came back the orignial way, made another stqange movement and then shot off to the west. This was traveling much faster than a plane and must have been relatively low as there was complete cloud cover.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Vestal
This sighting has never been favorited.
